text.value: How many people passed away in this household
Do you want to know more about family planning?
Did you give any referral in this household?
Mark any referral you have given in this household:
How many people are in your household?
Do you use any family planning methods?
Which family planning method do you use?
It is important you use mosquito nets for safety of you and family.
Is there a new born baby in a household
How many new babies in a household
Has anyone died in this household?
What did sick person 1 suffering from?
Did sick person 1 go to the health facility?
How many days ago did sick person 1 go to the health facility?
Did sick person 1 get meds from the health facility?
Did sick person 1 finish the meds from the health facility?
Advise person 1 to go to health facility again
Advise person 1 to finish the full dose
Person 1 should go to the health facility if it is serious
What did sick person 2 suffering from?
Did sick person 2 go to the health facility?

Did sick person 2 get meds from the health facility?
Did sick person 2 finish the meds from the health facility?

Advise person 2 to finish the full dose
person 2 should go to the health facility if it is serious

Did sick person 3 get meds from the health facility?
Did sick person 3 finish the meds from the health facility?
Advise person 3 to go to health facility again
Advise person 3 to finish the full dose
person 3 should go to the health facility if it is serious

Advise person 4 to finish the full dose
person 4 should go to the health facility if it is serious
Great! Make sure she is registered on pregnancy module
Make sure she is registered on pregnancy
Are there any children under 2 years of age?
How many children are under 2 years of age?
Are all of the immunizations up to date?
Please go to the clinic to get missing immunizations
How far away is the toilet that you use (in steps)?
Please encourage the household to build a toilet
How many mosquito nets do you have?
Check the appropriate box bellow whether you use treated nets or not
Where was the birth of 1 Child?
Who was present when Child 1 was born?
How old is the mother of Child 1?
Where was the birth of 2 Child?
Who was present when Child 2 was born?
How old is the mother of Child 1
Where do you get your drinking water from?
Buy on the street people selling
Was the person 1 who died under 2 years?
Had the person 1 been diagnosed with TB recently?
Was the person 1 visiting CTC? (the hiv treatment clinics)
Did person 1 have a high fever?
Did the person 1 go to a health facility
Did person 1 die due to a pregnancy complication?

Was the person 2 visiting CTC? (the hiv treatment clinics)
Did person 2 have a high fever?

Je mazingira ya choo ni masafi?
Ungependa kujua zaidi juu ya uzazi wa mpango?
Chagua rufaa ulizotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Je kuna rufaa uliyotoa kwenye kaya hii?
Ni muhimu sana kutumia chandarua kwa ajili ya kuikinga familia yako na malaria.
Kuna mtoto mchanga aliyezaliwa kwenye kaya hii tangu CHP alipotembelea?
Idadi ya watoto waliozaliwa kwenye kaya hii
Kuna tatizo lolote lililotokea mfano kifo tangu CHP alipotembelea?
Tafadhali andika namba ya Kaya unayotembelea
Unatumia njia ya uzazi wa mpango?
Unatumia njia gani ya uzazi wa mpango?
Je mgonjwa 1 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Mshauri mgonjwa 1 kwenda tena kituo cha afya
Mgonjwa 1 aende kituo cha afya kama hali ni mbaya
Mgonjwa 2 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Mshauri mgonjwa 2 kwenda tena kituo cha afya
Mgonjwa 2 aende kituo cha afya kama hali ni mbaya
Mgonjwa 3 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Mshauri mgonjwa 3 kwenda tena kituo cha afya
Mgonjwa 3 aende kituo cha afya kama hali ni mbaya
Mgonjwa 4 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Mshauri mgonjwa 4 kwenda tena kituo cha afya
Mgonjwa 4 aende kituo cha afya kama hali ni mbaya
Tafadhali sana kumbuka kumuandikisha mama huyu kwenye orodha ya wajawazito
Je kuna mtoto mwenye umri chini ya miaka 2?
Ni watoto wangapi umrichini ya miaka 2?
Kuna umbali gani kutoka kwenye choo mnachotumia(kadiria kwa hatua)?
Toa maelezo kama vyandarua vina dawa au havina?
Je mnapata wapi maji ya kunywa?
Ni watu wangapi wamefariki kwenye kaya hii
Marehemu 1 alikuwa na umri chini ya miaka 2?
Marehemu 1 alikuwa kwenye matibabu ya Kifua Kikuu?
Marehemu 1 alikuwa anahudhuria CTC (cliniki ya wenye UKIMWI)
Marehemu wa 1 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Marehemu wa 1 alikufa kutokana na matatizo ya mimba?
Marehemu 2 alikuwa na umri chini ya miaka 2?
Marehemu 2 alikuwa kwenye matibabu ya Kifua Kikuu?
Marehemu 2 alikuwa anahudhuria CTC (cliniki ya wenye UKIMWI)
Marehemu wa 2 alikwenda kwenye kituo cha afya?
Marehemu wa 2 alikufa kutokana na matatizo ya mimba?

Angalia Idadi ya watoto chini ya miaka 2?
Angalia idadi ya vyandarua ni sahihi?
